title: Candlestick, late 18th century
markings: Printed on paper label, underside of  base: "DOUANES FRANCAISES / PARIS", in circle surrounding "SERVICE [D]ES EX[obliterated]TIONS"
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Howard J. Sachs and Mr. Peter G. Sachs in memory of Miss Edith L. Sachs
description: White marble candlestick (a), the urn shaped nozzle with removeable ormolu leaf collar (b), on fluted columnar shaft with ormolu stops; capstan base with leaf tip and bead molding.

tombstone.epitaph:
Candlestick, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Marble, gilt bronze. Gift of Mrs. Howard J. Sachs and Mr. Peter G. Sachs in memory of Miss Edith L. Sachs. 1978-168-63-a,b.
